summary: This is a Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) memorandum summarizing a voluntary interview conducted on July 14, 2021, with a Lieutenant from the Federal Bureau of Prisons (BOP) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. The interview is part of an official OIG investigation into the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein on August 10, 2019. The memorandum lists numerous attachments, including the interview transcript, prison logs, and photographs related to Epstein's incarceration.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate whose death on August 10, 2019, at the MCC New York is the subject of the OIG investigation. He was housed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.role: BOP Lieutenant, MCC New York Staff
persons.context: A staff member assigned to the MCC New York Special Housing Unit on August 9, 2019, who was voluntarily interviewed by OIG agents on July 14, 2021, regarding the circumstances surrounding Epstein's death.

persons.name: Senior Special Agent
persons.context: A Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General agent who, along with Special Agents, conducted the interview of the BOP Lieutenant on July 14, 2021.

persons.name: Special Agents
persons.context: Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General agents who assisted in conducting the interview of the BOP Lieutenant on July 14, 2021.

persons.name: Preparer
persons.context: The individual who prepared this OIG memorandum of investigation.

persons.name: Reviewer
persons.role: Report Reviewer, Senior Special Agent, Assistant Special Agent in Charge
persons.context: The individual who reviewed the OIG memorandum. Holds the titles of Senior Special Agent and Assistant Special Agent in Charge.

connections.description: The OIG Senior Special Agent interviewed the BOP Lieutenant as part of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.
OIG Special Agents participated in conducting the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant.
The BOP Lieutenant was a staff member assigned to the Special Housing Unit where inmate Jeffrey Epstein was housed prior to his death.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Lieutenant
events.description: Senior Special Agent and Special Agents from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General conducted a voluntary, recorded interview with a BOP Lieutenant from MCC New York regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Found Unresponsive
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York.

events.title: Lieutenant's SHU Assignment Before Epstein's Death
events.description: The interviewed BOP Lieutenant was assigned to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at MCC New York, the unit where Jeffrey Epstein was housed.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York
MCC New York Special Housing Unit (SHU)
keyFacts: The Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) is investigating the death of BOP inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Register Number 76318-054).
A BOP Lieutenant from MCC New York was interviewed on July 14, 2021; this Lieutenant was assigned to the Special Housing Unit on August 9, 2019, the day before Epstein was found dead.

The memorandum lists 23 attachments as evidence, including the interview transcript, prison assignment rosters, round sheets, count documentation, cell search records, and photographs of Epstein's cell.
The document is an internal OIG memorandum containing neither recommendations nor conclusions, and is restricted from distribution outside the receiving agency.
